titles.title: Appointing and authorizing managers for the impeachment trial of Donald John Trump, President of the United States.
Appointing and authorizing managers for the impeachment trial of Donald John Trump, President of the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

vote.text: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 41, H. Res. 40 is considered passed House.

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption
Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary: This resolution (1) appoints Representatives Raskin, DeGette, Cicilline, Castro, Swalwell, Lieu, Neguse, and Dean, and Delegate Plaskett, as managers to conduct the impeachment trial against President Donald Trump; (2) requires the Senate to be informed of the appointments; and (3) authorizes the managers to exhibit the articles of impeachment to the Senate and take other necessary actions.
